sentences.en: A blade guard is fitted to protect the operator.
sentences.cn: 为保证操作人员的人身安全安装了桨叶保护罩。

sentences.en: A telephone operator asked him to hold.
sentences.cn: 电话接线员让他不要挂断。

sentences.en: An operator wearing earphone was sitting in the telephone exchange.
sentences.cn: 戴耳机的接线员正坐在总机室里.

sentences.en: Check the operator'sproductivity against agreed targets.
sentences.cn: 根据既定目标检验操作员的效率。

sentences.en: computers which can be used by untrained operators
sentences.cn: 未经训练的操作者也可使用的电脑

sentences.en: He was a smart operator. Don't underestimate him.
sentences.cn: 他这个人精明圆滑，可别小瞧了他。

sentences.en: Hello, operator? Could you put me through to Room 31?
sentences.cn: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.en: I became a ham radio operator at the age of eleven.
sentences.cn: 我在11岁时成了一名业余无线电操作员。

sentences.en: Operator, I want to make a long distance call.
sentences.cn: 话务员, 我要打长途电话.

sentences.en: Operator, you've connected me to the wrong person again!
sentences.cn: 接线员, 你又把我的电话接错啦!

sentences.en: She had worked as a call centre operator making cold calls for time-share holidays.
sentences.cn: 她曾经在话务中心当过话务员，负责打电话推销分时度假。

sentences.en: The operator expects the ship to be out of commission until the end of September.
sentences.cn: 技工预计这艘船到9月底才能修好。

sentences.en: The operator told the caller that the line is busy.
sentences.cn: 接线员告诉打电话的人对方电话占线.

sentences.en: The operator will put you through.
sentences.cn: 接线员会为你接通电话。
话务员给我们接通了电话.

培训生产员工；火车司机

trans.tran_cn: 经营者，操作员，电话接线员，运算符
trans.tran_en: someone who operates a machine or piece of equipment
